data.eml:eml: Mediterranean fish biodiversity: an updated inventory with focus on the Ligurian and Tyrrhenian seas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Psomadakis, Peter Nick, Giustino, Stefano, Vacchi, Marino (2012): Mediterranean fish biodiversity: an updated inventory with focus on the Ligurian and Tyrrhenian seas. Zootaxa 3263: 1-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280724
